attributes.action: make the use of state funds to benefit a political party an indictable offence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
State funding of political parties would:
* tend to strengthen the power of existing parties to the detriment of those with fresh ideas
* force taxpayers to support parties whose policies they strongly opposed
* by taking funding out of local hands, reduce the active participation of the electorate in political matters.
